judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagbn, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and ManDERINO, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: Linda West Oonley, James T. Ranney and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Johnson, Appellant.
Submitted January 8, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagbn, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and ManDERINO, JJ.
Kenneth S. Harris, for appellant.
Linda West Oonley, James T. Ranney and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
November 26, 1973:
